paragraph: Gene Cantamessa (February 17, 1931 â€“ November 8, 2011) was an American sound engineer. He won an Academy Award for Best Sound for his work on the 1982 Steven Spielberg film, E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial. Cantamessa received six additional Academy Award nominations in the same category during his career.
Cantamessa won an Academy Award and was nominated for six more:
Close Encounters of the Third Kind (1977)
Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)
